title: Bug 112458Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch to Master page viewer.
description: Description:Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch toMaster page viewer.Steps to reproduce:1. New a report and insert a label.2. Select the label.(Property Editor shows label's properties)3. Switch to Master Page.Expected result:Property Editor changs to reflect Master Page properties.Actual result:It still showed the label's properties. This will confuse customers if theythought it as Master Page Editor and set properties without click Master Pageviewer at first.
